c74object.name: vatodb~
c74object.description:
vatodb~ provides a CPU efficient version of atodb~ using SIMD operations.
Use the vatodb~ to convert a signal representing a linear value to a deciBel equivalent.

method.name: signal
method.digest: A signal representing a linear value
method.description: A signal representing a linear value. It is converted to a gain/attenuation, expressed in deciBels, and output as a signal.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: The gain or attenuation from unity gain, expressed in deciBels, is output as a signal.
